attributes.action: Ban "unreal Roulette" machines in all bookmakers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Touchscreen roulette used in every bookmakers is a pre-chosen and unfare way for them to rake in thousands from people every day. They remember how much they have given away and how much they have taken as they are designed to make money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
